findings.reason: Tracking storage: Tracking or storage executes before consent is confirmed.

problems.problem: Tracking storage: Tracking technologies require prior consent (GDPR Art. 7, DPDP Sec. 5).

findings.snippet:
sdk.store.order
    .requestTransfer(
      id,
      {},
      {
        fields: "id, email",
      },
      headers
    )
    .then(({ order }) => ({ success: true, error: null, order }))
    .catch((err) => ({ success: false, error: err.message, order: null }))
findings.reason: Email: Transfers personal data to backend services before consent.

problems.problem: Email: Transferring personal data requires a lawful basis (GDPR Art. 6, DPDP Sec. 7).
